title: Bowers and Wilkins' new Zeppelin speaker nixes the dock to go wireless
text:
Bowers and Wilkins' new Zeppelin speaker nixes the dock to go wireless 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
Eight years ago, Bowers & Wilkins released its first Zeppelin speaker dock. After a few updates along the way, the company nixed the doc... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
